author: admin
title: GAO Market in Latin America - Market Research 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 11:43 AM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About GAO marketBased on Technavio research on the IT markets in Latin America, availability of cost-effective, advanced technologies, and favorable business conditions positioned Latin America as one of the most favourable destinations for foreign investments. This is attributed to a positive impact on political stability in the environment. Therefore, populous countries and rapidly expanding economies such as India and China are likely to add significant revenue advantages to several industries across the US and European countries.Technavio's analysts forecast the GAO market in Latin America to grow at a CAGR of 12.67% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this Report The report covers the current scenario and the growth prospects of the GAO market in Latin America for the period of 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the following general administrative activities:- FAO
